name: Portfolio Final
description:
This is a standard side-scrolling shoot-em up that I made for my Portfolio and Advanced Programming classes. 

You take control of a Jedi Starship and are facing against the Empire in a seemingly impossible battle. See how long you can last by maneuvering around them or shooting them and making sure they don't come back!

It's still very much in early development and I do plan on putting more work into this in order for it to be as enjoyable as possible.

To play the game: Download the above file, extract it and go into Schillinger_Lab1->bin->Windows->x86->Debug, and double click on Schillinger_Lab3.exe.
